ide.backend.blocks.conditions

Class WhileBlock

  • java.lang.Object
    • ide.backend.blocks.conditions.WhileBlock
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Block

    public class WhileBlock
extends java.lang.Object
implements Block
    The while-Block will push it's entire body on the stack if it condition evalutes to true. But it will also push itself.
    Author:
    matthijs
